response.original_title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Seven
response.overview: Were Wild Horses... In many remote areas of Australia, Feral Horses may be considered an undesirable pest. Here in the north, these wild rides that stem from diverse brumby lines, show their true value, as “Were Wild Horses” -Speedy bush horses that contend in far Northern Australia’s rawest racing event -The Bamaga Cup. Come behind the scenes with Croc and see how many of the locals hack it, in locating and training these “ bush-bloods”. Most riders lack the basics in gear, but with a glint of gold cup glory in their eyes, they put on a show that’s both hilarious and full of action. Follow the antics of a race that could be confused for a steeplechase or a rodeo!
response.title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Seven
